verses.text: \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* tabernacle? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*?

\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H1980"\w* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H8549"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w worketh|strong="H6466"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* truth \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*;

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H7451"\w* slandereth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, \w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w taketh|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*;

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* whose \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w reprobate|strong="H3988"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w despised|strong="H3988"\w*, \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* honoreth \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w sweareth|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w hurt|strong="H7489"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w changeth|strong="H4171"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*;

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w putteth|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w interest|strong="H5392"\w*, \w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w taketh|strong="H3947"\w* \w reward|strong="H7810"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.
